title: How to Activate an iPhone with AT&T

steps.title: Go to https://www.att.com/activations/.
steps.content: Go to https://www.att.com/activations/ . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click on Continue.
steps.content: Click on Continue . Follow the on-screen prompts to proceed with activation.

steps.title: Locate your iPhone's IMEI number.
steps.content: Locate your iPhone's IMEI number. The IMEI number is usually printed on the back of the iPhone's packaging. It's printed on a white sticker with barcodes and is often labeled "IMEI/MEID." You can also access the IMEI number by dialing *#06#. It's also available via your iPhone's settings: Tap the Settings app . Tap General . Tap About .

steps.title: Enter and verify your IMEI number.
steps.content: Enter and verify your IMEI number. When asked, input your IMEI number and verify that it matches the one listed on the AT&T site associated with your account.

steps.title: Restart your iPhone.
steps.content: Restart your iPhone. Once finished with the online activation prompts, hold down the Sleep/Wake button until you see "slide to power off" on your screen, then slide the power button to the right. Wait 5 minutes and then press and hold the Sleep/Wake button until you see the Apple logo. Your iPhone should be activated on the AT&T network. If you could not complete the activation online, you will need to call AT&T's customer support or visit an AT&T store to talk with an AT&T representative to finish activating your iPhone.

steps.title: Call 1-800-331-0500.
steps.content: Call 1-800-331-0500. From a separate working telephone, dial 1-800-331-0500 and wait until you are connected to AT&T's customer support line.

steps.title: Say "I would like to activate my iPhone," when prompted.
steps.content: Say "I would like to activate my iPhone," when prompted. When you call, an automated system will ask "How can I help you today?". Speak clearly and say that you would like to activate your iPhone.

steps.title: Say the phone number of your AT&T account.
steps.content: Say the phone number of your AT&T account. When asked "what number are you calling to activate," say your phone number clearly. This will help the automated system to access your account information.

steps.title: Confirm the phone number.
steps.content: Confirm the phone number. The automated system will say the phone number back to you and you can confirm "Yes" or "No" if it's correct.

steps.title: Talk with a representative.
steps.content: Talk with a representative. After confirming your number, you will be connected with an AT&T representative who will help you complete the activation process for your iPhone.
